{"id":996836587,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1689610866,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/996836587/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers II","memory":"N/A","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        ListNode* temp=l1,*res,*head;\n        long long num1=0,num2=0;\n        int i=1,n;\n        string sum;\n        while(temp){\n            num1=(num1*10)+temp->val;\n            temp=temp->next;\n        }\n        temp=l2;\n        while(temp){\n            num2=(num2*10)+temp->val;\n            temp=temp->next;\n        }\n        sum=to_string(num1+num2);\n        n=sum.length();\n        res=new ListNode(sum[0]-'0'),head=res;\n        while(i<n){\n            ListNode* node=new ListNode(sum[i]-'0');\n            res->next=node;\n            res=res->next;\n            i++;\n        }\n        return head;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
